name: Tea-D
description:
Made for CurdleJam#25 themed 'Spare Change'. It's Whack-A-Mole meets Tower Defense!

It's Tea-Time, but the local moles aint happy about it!

Use the tools at your disposal to fend off the approaching horde. You can change between hammering them, or using a net to spare the moles. But be wary that the moles will adapt to cope with your chosen strategy each new wave!

Can you clear all 5 waves before your tea gets cold (or worse, obliterated?!).

Best played with a controller, but mouse and keyboard work too.
Downloaded Windows build also recommended for better performance (and fancy grass).
